sae_text: I understand that people enter your life and things happen for a reason, but I’m completely clueless about this situation.

sae_text: I will admit, cannabis helped the static in my brain go away. It made this world more tolerable. I was happy, but now I'm in this damp fog.
aae_text: I’ma be real, weed made all that noise in my head chill out. Made this world a lil’ easier to deal with. I was good, but now I’m stuck in this heavy fog.

sae_text: "I wasn't a drug user, I wasn't an addict, nor was I harming myself. My own lazy, childish behavior put me where I am now."
aae_text: I wasn’t out here usin’ drugs, I wasn’t no addict, and I wasn’t hurtin’ myself. It was my own lazy, childish ways that got me where I’m at now.

sae_text: I mean, I'm from Chicago. I'll cheer for the Bears, but I'm a bigger 49ers fan.
aae_text: I mean, I’m from Chicago. I’ma root for the Bears, but I rock wit the 49ers more.
